replies.body: I tried buying MR vs a fed Diana it did literally f*ck all.
That's because she is fed, you literally answered your owned question. The Diana nerfs aren't coming.
Yeah and she is really easy to get fed on.

I was trying to kite out a Nidalee in a clutch melee brawl today coz I knew nid had 125 range and I had 150 but it didn't quite work out but Olafs coming at you and stuff are basically GG - I think with the Changes to AP items though, being such an early-mid Assassins she is in a good spot, but I guess a lot of the other AP mids got just as much of a benefit out of it - It just feels like in being an Assassins she hits power spikes sooner and a lot harder than a lot of Champs and she's also good at dealing with all the Yasuos, Zed's and Talons mid and the Runeglaive addition made her once strong jungle even better

I thought her win rate would be like 53% tbh - seeing her in a lot of games lately in mid lane and in the jungle - and Riot tends to catch on to these spam picks quickly...
